main event: A private citizen in Edenton, North Carolina, reported sighting an oval-shaped object with flashing lights attached to a parachute in 1954.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on December 6, 1954, at 8:15 PM EST.
The observation lasted for 15 minutes, allowing for a prolonged viewing of the object.
The observer reported the sighting to the local Civil Defense office but did not submit a report to Project Blue Book.
The object was described as oval-shaped and appeared to have flashing lights.
The report mentioned that the object appeared to be connected to a parachute, implying a controlled descent.
sighted object: oval-shaped object with flashing lights attached to a parachute
